nodes.text: Smash was a drug which existed during the High Republic Era. It had stimulating effects. It was consumed by being inhaled out of smashbulbs, which were compatible with a wide variety of anatomical gas exchange systems. When run directly into the gas filters of a mask worn by the consumer, the effects of the drug was intensified. Members of Kassav Milliko's Tempest of the Nihil frequently took smash.
